H0.text: Speculation towards the end of 2007 suggested that Rupert Murdoch's News International Group was in discussion to buy what significant business networking website. XING

H1.text: Speculation towards the end of 2007 suggested that Rupert Murdoch's News International Group was in discussion to buy what significant business networking website. Plaxo

H2.text: Speculation towards the end of 2007 suggested that Rupert Murdoch's News International Group was in discussion to buy what significant business networking website. LinkedIn's competitor, Viadeo

H3.text: Speculation towards the end of 2007 suggested that Rupert Murdoch's News International Group was in discussion to buy what significant business networking website. LNKD

A4.text: Viadeo was often compared to LinkedIn, offering free access but not being able to compete with the larger corporation
